mapper.select: SELECT SU_CODE AS SUCODE, SU_NAME AS SUNAME, SU_NICKNAME AS SUNICKNAME, SU_EMAIL AS SUEMAIL, SU_PHONE AS SUPHONE ,SU_PHOTO AS SUPHOTO ,SU_THEME AS SUTHEME FROM SU WHERE SU_CODE = #{suCode}

SELECT BB_CODE AS BBCODE, BB_SUCODE AS SUCODE, BB_NAME AS BBNAME, TO_CHAR(BB_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BBBIRTHDAY, BBWEIGHT, BBHEIGHT,BB_PHOTO AS BBPHOTO FROM BB LEFT OUTER JOIN BABYRECENTWEIGHT ON (BB_CODE = WBABYCODE AND BB_SUCODE = WSUCODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN BABYRECENTHEIGHT ON (BB_CODE = HBABYCODE AND BB_SUCODE = HSUCODE) WHERE BB_SUCODE = #{suCode} ORDER BY BBCODE
mapper.update: UPDATE SU SET SU_NICKNAME = #{suNickName} WHERE SU_CODE = #{suCode}
UPDATE BABY SET BB_BIRTHDAY = TO_DATE(#{bbBirthday},'YY-MM-DD') WHERE BB_SUCODE = #{suCode} AND BB_CODE = #{bbCode}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(LTRIM(NVL(TO_CHAR(MAX(BB_CODE)+1,'00'),' 01')), '') AS BABYCODE FROM BB WHERE BB_SUCODE = #{suCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE SU SET SU_PHOTO = #{suPhoto} WHERE SU_CODE = #{suCode}
UPDATE BABY SET BB_PHOTO = #{bbPhoto} WHERE BB_SUCODE = #{suCode} AND BB_CODE = #{bbCode}
UPDATE SU SET SU_THEME = #{suTheme} WHERE SU_CODE = #{suCode}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HD WHERE HD_BBSUCODE = #{suCode} AND TO_CHAR(HD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DD WHERE DD_SUCODE = #{suCode} AND TO_CHAR(DD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date}

SELECT COCODE AS RESCOCODE, CONAME AS RESCONAME, RECODE AS RESCODE, TO_CHAR(REDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RESDATE, BBNAME AS RESBBNAME FROM CORE WHERE TO_CHAR(REDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date} AND SUCODE = #{suCode} AND STATUS ='CP'
SELECT SC_CODE AS SCHEDULECODE, TO_CHAR(SC_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SCHEDULEDATE, SC_CONTENT AS SCHEDULENAME FROM SC WHERE TO_CHAR(SC_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date} AND SC_SUCODE = #{suCode}
SELECT NVL(MAX(SC_CODE)+1 , (REPLACE(#{scheduleDate}, '-', '')|| '01')) FROM SC WHERE SC_SUCODE = #{suCode} AND TO_CHAR(SC_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{scheduleDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE SC SET SC_CONTENT = #{scheduleName} WHERE SC_CODE = #{scheduleCode} AND TO_CHAR(SC_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{scheduleDate} AND SC_SUCODE = #{suCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SC WHERE SC_CODE = #{scheduleCode} AND SC_SUCODE = #{suCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE RE SET RE_RCCODE = #{rcCode} WHERE RE_CODE = #{resCode} AND TO_CHAR(RE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{resDate} AND RE_BBSUCODE = #{suCode} AND RE_RCCODE = 'CP'
